text: So i build an app that uses ML to predict winners. My problem is execution. I don't really know whether to take a price or offer a price. I'm struggling to get match on my offers and the taking prices seems to end up in me getting a bad deal. Any pointers?

text:
Nice one. From there I have:

• `MarketBook.complete` property - which I guess becomes true on race complete
• `RunnerBook.sp`  property to get the SPs for the runners
• Not sure how I find if it won/placed/lost?
